response:
The image contains the following elements:

1. A green ball located near the center.
2. Text below the green ball that reads "TENNIS BALL".
3. A blue horizontal line at the bottom of the image.

Here is the JSON representation of the positions of these objects:

```json
[
    {"bbox_2d": [168, 90, 174, 105], "label": "green ball"},
    {"bbox_2d": [168, 105, 174, 111], "label": "text"},
    {"bbox_2d": [0, 300, 252, 305], "label": "blue horizontal line"}
]
```

Note: The exact coordinates depend on the scale and resolution of the image, but this JSON provides a general outline of the positions based on the description provided.<|im_end|>
